channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 23:20 Air alarm to Cherkasy district care for further messages.
item.description: 游댮 23:20 Air alarm to Cherkasy district care for further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游 23:00 Attention !!! Threat of use of managed aviation bombs (cabin).
item.description: 游 23:00 Attention !!! Threat of use of managed aviation bombs (cabin). This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 22:07 Alarm to the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kamyansky district- Novomoskovsky district- Dniprovsky district- Pavlograd district- Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community and Nikopol Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 22:07 Alarm to the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kamyansky district- Novomoskovsky district- Dniprovsky district- Pavlograd district- Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community and Nikopol Territorial Community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
